member.name: T:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion
member.summary: Browser Emulation

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE7
member.summary: Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE7 Standards mode. Default value for applications hosting the WebBrowser Control.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE8
member.summary: Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE8 mode. Default value for Internet Explorer 8.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE8Standards
member.summary: Webpages are displayed in IE8 Standards mode, regardless of the declared !DOCTYPE directive. Failing to declare a !DOCTYPE directive causes the page to load in Quirks.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE9
member.summary: Internet Explorer 9. Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE9 mode. Default value for Internet Explorer 9.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE9Standards
member.summary: Windows Internet Explorer 9. Webpages are displayed in IE9 Standards mode, regardless of the declared !DOCTYPE directive. Failing to declare a !DOCTYPE directive causes the page to load in Quirks.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE10
member.summary: Internet Explorer 10. Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE10 Standards mode. Default value for Internet Explorer 10.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE10Standards
member.summary: Internet Explorer 10. Webpages are displayed in IE10 Standards mode, regardless of the !DOCTYPE directive.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE11
member.summary: IE11. Webpages containing standards-based !DOCTYPE directives are displayed in IE11 edge mode. Default value for IE11.

member.name: F:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.BrowserEmulationVersion.IE11Edge
member.summary: Internet Explorer 11. Webpages are displayed in IE11 edge mode, regardless of the declared !DOCTYPE directive. Failing to declare a !DOCTYPE directive causes the page to load in Quirks.

member.name: P:Nemiro.OAuth.LoginForms.Properties.Resources.MediaKit
member.summary:
Ищет локализованную строку, похожую на Aleksey Sergeevich Nemiro is a Russian developer of applications and websites, author of articles on programming and information technology.
Aleksey was born on October 3, 1983 in the city of Vladivostok (Primorsky Krai, Russia). In 2009, Aleksey migrated to the city of Yoshkar-Ola (Mari El, Russia).
Started programming in 1998 on the G-Basic and QBasic.
At various times worked with programming languages and technologies: Visaul Basic, Delphi, C, Visual C++, Java, PHP, ASP VBScript and JScript [остаток строки не уместился]";.
